message.body: Pretty good. How are things with you?
good. about to go to a pilates class, i'll text you after?
Hi back! How was your class?
good. i haven't worked out in sooo long so it felt amazing. how was your day?
An amazing workout? Must've been some class. Nothing too exciting here. Reading and lesson planning.
how do your students seem so far? and it was really good! i just really needed to be stretched out and whatever.
Stretched out? That sounds painful. Students seem okay so far. The big class should be interesting.
but it's good pain! is the big class the one you were surprised to find out you were teaching?
Good pain? Is that even possible? And yes, that's the surprise class. All 80 of them.
but of course. i'm surprised you're surprised by the idea.
also 80 is a lot of people.
Can't say I've ever enjoyed pain. The idea is foreign to me. But yes, it's a whole lot of people.
